Articles.Content:
MISSION REPORT

-Flight began at 12:35:11

-Flight ended due to spontaneous combustion

More like:

-Operation begin.

-Sorting through parts.

-Still sorting and sometimes attaching something when I figure out where it goes.

-Say 'Fuck it' and load the example.

-Strap on a booster, take it up and stage everything.

-Time for bed! Mission resume in 8 hours.
Just wondering, what size is this? Compatible with stock parts?
It\'s just a little bit wider than 1m. It comes with fairings both in 1m and 1,5m sizes.

Downloaded.

@OP, video uploaded for demo purposes 8)

Every time the game is loading it stops on the Soyuz Parachute, any help?

Fixed it.

Oh yeah, one more thing, is there actually any soyuz rocket that can lift this thing?I tried 3 different Soyuz rockets and combined some too, but everything failed after the boosters were off.Will you make a rocket once in the future too?For now I\'m using SiliskoEdition to get it into orbit.
do you plan on making the big soyuz ?
Big Soyuz as in the carrier rocket?

do you plan on making the big soyuz ?

Do you mean Mr. Explodey? That would be the N1 . Novasilisko already has a version in his first pack
Actually after a quick search, I think he might be possibly referring to this which literally is a larger Soyuz spacecraft.

I\'m asuming that the solar panels dont collect energy to fuel some sort of Ion engine?

More Pipe dreams for me tonight.
Not when they\'re coded as parachutes.
For getting the thing to space, the parts from KW pack work nice while also looking somewhat accurate. And for those other rockets, it\'ll have to be a no for now.
Now all you need is the Russian probe and drogue docking system.

THOSE ARE THE LARGEST IMAGES I HAVE EVER SEEN ON THE INTERNET

OH GOD
What about your solar system diagrams?

THOSE ARE THE LARGEST IMAGES I HAVE EVER SEEN ON THE INTERNET

OH GOD

*dramatic voice* Not quite...

http://www.paris-26-gigapixels.com/index-en.html
If you want a crude imitation for now (before docking gets implemented) you can put the vanilla parachute on the top. I\'m not sure if the fairings will work but at least it looks vaguely accurate.
Bugs are not fixed the game wont load it at all :-\
You\'ve done something wrong then. I downloaded the mod just now and it works just as it should.
what version do you have

what version do you have

This is hilarity at its finest.

You go from making two threads entirely in caps about a simple problem, to trying to help someone with a much more complicated problem.

This is hilarity at its finest.

Bugs are not fixed the game wont load it at all :-\

It works on every computer I checked it on. It must be something on your side.

Bugs are not fixed the game wont load it at all :-\

You obviously have no idea how to install a single mod. Every thread I see you in you\'re always complaining about how their mod broke your game. These things almost always have instructions with them. Read them.
